name: shadowverse-battle-log-backend
description: Shadowverse Battle Log - Azure Functions Backend

scripts.copy: cp host.json dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/getBattleLogs dist/createBattleLog dist/deleteBattleLog dist/health dist/importData dist/getStatistics && cp src/getBattleLogs/function.json dist/getBattleLogs/ && cp src/createBattleLog/function.json dist/createBattleLog/ && cp src/deleteBattleLog/function.json dist/deleteBattleLog/ && cp src/health/function.json dist/health/ && cp src/importData/function.json dist/importData/ && cp src/getStatistics/function.json dist/getStatistics/
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
